mapper.select: SELECT target as gid,st_asgeojson(rc.geom) as geom FROM pgr_drivingDistance ('SELECT gid as id, source, target, length as cost FROM hooya_gis_line',#{pointId},#{distance},false) dd, hooya_gis_line rc WHERE rc.gid = dd.edge
SELECT id::integer FROM hooya_gis_line_vertices_pgr ORDER BY the_geom <-> ST_GeometryFromText('POINT(${lat} ${lng})',4326) LIMIT 1
SELECT ST_Intersects ( ( SELECT t.geom FROM hooya_gis_line t WHERE t.gid = #{line} ) :: geometry, ( SELECT t.geom FROM hooya_gis_line t WHERE t.gid = #{line2} ) :: geometry )
SELECT count(1) FROM hooya_gis_line t where 1=1 and t.area = #{area}
SELECT CASE WHEN SUM( T.shape_leng ) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM ( T.shape_leng ) END FROM hooya_gis_line T WHERE 1 = 1 and t.enticlassi = #{enticlassi} and t.area = #{area}

SELECT t.gid, t.objectid, t.enticlassi, t.entiid, t.name, t.material, t.techlevel, t.roadlevel, t.shape_leng, t.geom FROM hooya_gis_line t where 1=1 and t.enticlassi = #{enticlassi} and t.area = #{area}
SELECT st_asgeojson(ST_Intersection ( ( SELECT t.geom FROM hooya_gis_line t WHERE t.gid = #{line} ) :: geometry, ( SELECT t.geom FROM hooya_gis_line t WHERE t.gid = #{line2} ) :: geometry ))
SELECT st_asgeojson(ST_Intersection ( ( SELECT t.geom FROM hooya_gis_line t WHERE t.gid = #{gid} ) :: geometry, ${geometry} :: geometry ))
select count(1) from intersection_point t where t.lng=#{lng} and t.lat=#{lat}
SELECT st_astext(t.geom) FROM hooya_gis_line t WHERE t.gid = #{gid}
